name: aecoms
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

stmt.origin: sylbi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
-| wb(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
-| wi(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
-| wb(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
-| wi(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), w0)

body.origin: |- wb(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
-| wi(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), w0)

comment: A commutation rule for identical variable specifiers. (Contributed by NM, 10-May-1993.)
